channel.title: Prayer/PK icons are mixed up. Please help
channel.description:
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/9712/hextion0004.png[/img]
client download: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?21ulu0zjtyi
Stuff that needs to be fixed:
Protect from melee looks like pk skull. PK skull looks like protect from mage.
I tried to fix but it didnt really work out. All of the clients folders are hidden so you have to change ur computer to view hidden files and folders.
